Address.title: Address
Address.description: The address field to be populated with the Candidate's Address from the CV Document Format: Text

CVTitle.title: CVTitle
CVTitle.description: The title of the cv document

Certs.title: Certs
Certs.description: Data Type: Long Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Certification's section on the CV Document. Format: Write in Bullet Point Format

DOB.title: DOB
DOB.description: The Date Field to be populated with the Candidate's date of birth from the CV Document Format: YYYY-MM-DD IF there is no date of birth on the CV this can be ignored

Education.title: Education
Education.description: Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Education section on the CV Document. Format: Rich Text Bullet Point Institution Qualification Year Qualified Any other information mentioned like subjects, activities, affiliations etc

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: Data Type: Rich Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the Work/ Professional Experience section on the CV Document. Format: Rich Text Title | Company Name | Location | Date from and To Bullet point of their duties, Projects they worked on, Achievements and anything else they mentioned Reason for leaving if on CV

Fname.title: Fname
Fname.description: First Name of the candidate on the CV

LName.title: LName
LName.description: Last Name of the candidate on the CV

Level.title: Level
Level.description: Seniority Level (Junior, Intermediate, Mid, Senior), make a judgement call, this would be based on number of years experience, current position title etc

Overview.title: Overview
Overview.description: This is a summary of the Candidate done by the Agent, summarising their overall CV. Format: Long Text Example: This Candidate is a Salesforce Architect and has 7 years Professional working experience with 5 years in Salesforce, they have a degree in Computer Sciences and 5 Salesforce Certifications

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: Data Type: Long Text: Extracted from the candidate's CV using Einstein's data parsing found from the skills section on the CV Document. Format: Write in Bullet Point Format
